name: Helvegr
description:
Helvegr

This game was made by a bunch of people with way too busy schedules for the 2019 edition of the World MytholoJam.

THE GAME

“Helvegr” means “The road to Hel”. This game talks about the way the Viking people took care of their deads. There’s a small twist though. This was made with Unity. Control scheme is super simple, you’ll only need a mouse.

CREDITS

A game by:

Claire Vantorre

Edouard Lavenue

Stephanie Tacoronte van Ommen

Jorge Hurtado

Music by:

- https://www.purple-planet.com

- Fólkvangr by Alexander Nakarada | https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com/ Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com/
